name: CONTAINMENT ZONE 15
description:
An infectious fungi has spread across the world, infecting everything.  An earthquake has sent the city that you live in 100s of feet under the surface trapping you and everything else inside.

You must try to survive for as long as you can.

WASD to move

Left click to mine most objects (Makes Noise)

1 to use med kits

2 to use food

Shift to run (makes noise)(increases hunger)

Q to toggle building mode

left click in building mode to build

Left click to break structures when not in building mode

Scroll wheel or number keys to switch building types in building mode

Right click to change materials in building mode

Left click a boarded opening in building mode to remove the planks
